title: Bubble-mediated generation of airborne nanoplastic particles
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00124A, Paper
Eva Rosendal Kj√¶rgaard, Freja Hasager, Sarah Suda Petters, Marianne Glasius, Merete Bilde
Bubbling air through water containing mono-disperse polystyrene nanoparticles is shown to result in transfer of nanoplastic particles to air.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
